## load data

```{r}
#DB01
DB01_202207_Folder <- (here("//nefscdata/PassiveAcoustics/DETECTOR_OUTPUT/PYTHON_SOUNDSCAPE_PYPAM/Raw/NEFSC_DE/NEFSC_DE_202207_DB01/NC"))
DB01_202207_Files <- list.files(DB01_202207_Folder, pattern='nc$', full.names=TRUE)
DB01_202207 = loadSoundscapeData(DB01_202207_Files, octave = "ol", timeBin= "1hour")

write.csv(DB01_202207, here("data", "DB01_202207_OL.csv")) #saving for now, but will actually load in all of the DB01 deployments and then join them, then do the same for the other sites








```
